title: Epic 39: AI Clinical Decision Support Agent
description: AI agent that provides real-time clinical decision support including diagnosis suggestions, treatment recommendations, contraindication alerts, and evidence-based care guidance. Enhances clinical outcomes through intelligent assistance.

userStories.title: AI clinical decision schema
userStories.description: Create database models for clinical decision support.
acceptanceCriteria: ClinicalAlert model with patientId, alertType, severity, message, acknowledged
DiagnosisSuggestion model with encounterId, suggestedCode, confidence, reasoning
TreatmentRecommendation model with patientId, condition, recommendation, evidence
Contraindication model with patientId, procedure, reason, source
ClinicalGuideline model with condition, recommendations, evidence, source
